attributes.action: Call a snap general election immediately
attributes.additional_details: In order to put things right, it’s only fair that a snap general election is called so the people can vote again but this time armed with the facts we now know today.
attributes.background: The current government gained power by campaigning a disingenuous manifesto leading to the public today feeling lied to and cheated.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
